Introduction

Jang Yun-ho, also known as Arthur, is a South Korean singer under GF Entertainment. He first debuted in 2017 as a member of the boy group VARSITY. After VARSITY's disbandment in 2020, he continued to train under a different agency. In 2021, he debuted once again, this time as a member of the boy group KINGDOM.

He officially made his debut as a member of VARSITY on January 9, 2017 with the single "Round One".

Arthur debuted as a member of KINGDOM on February 18, 2021 with their mini album History of Kingdom : PartⅠ. Arthur.

Within the group Kingdom, he represents the Kingdom of Rain.
